Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (84.62%) toKL4A6A: 46%, L=W: 15%, K: 23%.Activity: active against Gram- E. coli ATCC25922 or K88 or CVCC 1515 or UB1005 (MIC 4-8 uM), B. pyocyaneum ATCC 27853 (MIC 8 uM), S. typhimurium ATCC 14028 (MIC 32 uM), Gram+  S. aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC 8 uM) and S. epidermidis ATCC 12228 (MIC 8 uM).In vitro toxicity: 5% hemolysis concentration 256 uM.Structure: random coil in PBS and helical in 30 mM SDS or 50% TFE.
Literature Information.Author: Shao C, Li W, Lai Z, Akhtar MU, Dong N, Shan A, Ma D.2019
Literature Information.Reference: Chem Biol Drug Des. 2019 Dec;94(6):2051-2063. doi: 10.1111/cbdd.13608.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Effect of terminal arrangement of tryptophan on biological activity of symmetric alpha-helix-forming peptides.
